## R Markdown

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
df<-read.csv("data.csv")
clean_data<-na.omit(df)
```

```{r covid hours}
covid1 = clean_data[,c(3)]
covid2 = clean_data[,c(7)]
covid3 = clean_data[,c(10)]
covid4 = clean_data[,c(13)]

covid_list<-list(covid1, covid2, covid3, covid4)
covid_matrice<-do.call(cbind, covid_list)
covid_average<-rowMeans(covid_matrice)
covid_mean<-mean(covid_average)
centered_covid_avg<-covid_average - covid_mean
```

```{r quiz score}
quiz1 = clean_data[,c(5)]
quiz2 = clean_data[,c(8)]
quiz3 = clean_data[,c(11)]
quiz4 = clean_data[,c(14)]

quiz_list<-list(quiz1, quiz2, quiz3)
quiz_matrice<-do.call(cbind, quiz_list)
quiz_average<-rowMeans(quiz_matrice)
quiz_mean<-mean(quiz_average)
centered_quiz_avg<-quiz_average - quiz_mean
```

```{r stats hours}
sta1 = clean_data[,c(2)]
sta2 = clean_data[,c(6)]
sta3 = clean_data[,c(9)]
sta4 = clean_data[,c(12)]

sta_list<-list(sta1, sta2, sta3, sta4)
sta_matrice<-do.call(cbind, sta_list)
sta_average<-rowMeans(sta_matrice)
sta_mean<-mean(sta_average)
centered_sta_avg<-sta_average - sta_mean
```

```{r constructing final data frame}
X <- data.frame(centered_covid_avg, centered_sta_avg, centered_quiz_avg)
Y <- data.frame(quiz4)
pairs(X)
```
